chunks.text: When I was 12, I was bullied. I was excluded, called me names and beaten.
If you're being bullied, you aren't alone.
The best thing you can do is tell somebody.
I didn't, I let it go by, and I sat through all of it.
You don't need to tell a teacher.
If you do, it doesn't need to be your form teacher.
All you have to do is tell somebody and they will help you.

text: When I was 12, I was bullied. I was excluded, called me names and beaten. If you're being bullied, you aren't alone. The best thing you can do is tell somebody. I didn't, I let it go by, and I sat through all of it. You don't need to tell a teacher. If you do, it doesn't need to be your form teacher. All you have to do is tell somebody and they will help you.
